long_description: Stay warm without a bunch of bulkiness by donning the Mountain Hardwear Dome Perignon hat. It features AirShield(TM) windproof fleece for warmth on breezy summits. Main body of the hat is made with jacquard sweater fleece that provides great warmth and has an anti-pilling face. AirShield(TM) windproof fabric lines the hat for excellent protection against chilly winter breezes. Stretch fleece insert at back of head offers a nice fit. Mountain Hardwear Dome Perignon hat fully covers your ears and has a fleece-lined earband for great comfort next to skin.
short_description: Stay warm without a bunch of bulkiness by donning the Mountain Hardwear Dome Perignon hat. It features AirShield(TM) windproof fleece for warmth on breezy summits.
